tagblock.name: Scenery
tagblock.comment: This block allows you to "pose" this objects nodes. Used normally for dead bodies. The orientations block has an entry for each checked node flag, skipping unchecked ones. The blocks labeled [Readable] are modified to make reading/editing the values easier, but as a result the entry counts will be innaccurate, going too far may result in editing the wrong data. DO NOT USE THE BLOCK REALLOCATOR ON THE [READABLE] BLOCKS!
